original_text: This is the portion of a wicked man with God, and the heritage of oppressors, which they shall receive of the Almighty.
korean_text: 악인이 하나님께 얻을 분깃, 포악자가 전능자에게서 받을 산업은 이것이라

sentences.original_text: This is the portion of a wicked man with God
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 악인이 하나님과 함께 받을 몫이며

sentences.original_text: which they shall receive of the Almighty
